file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Configuration
  version: v1beta1
  description: |
    Fawkes Configuration REST API.
    Retrieve information from the configuration.
  contact:
    name:  Tim Niemueller
    email: niemueller@kbsg.rwth-aachen.de
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'

tags:
  - name: public
    description: Configuration public API.

paths:
  /config:
    get:
      tags:
      - public
      summary: Get information from the configuration.
      operationId: get_config
      description: |
        Get a list of plugins.
      parameters:
        - name: query
          in: query
          description: |
            Search query for configuration values. If no query is
            given, the full configuration tree will be returned.
          allowEmptyValue: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: pretty
          in: query
          description: Request pretty printed reply.
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: boolean
      responses:
        '200':
          description: matching configuration sub-tree.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConfigTree'
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter

components:
  schemas:
    ConfigTree:
      type: object
      required:
        - kind
        - apiVersion
        - config
      properties:
        kind:
          type: string
        apiVersion:
          type: string
        config:
          type: object
